CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, this field contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

EnrollmentCount.description: The number of employees that are insured at a specific tier.

FeeAmount.description: The fee amount for the insurance plan for a specific tier.

InsuranceRatePlanId.description: The parent insurance rate plan that's associated with the line item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the line item.

PremiumAmount.description: The premium amount for the insurance plan for a specific tier.

PremiumEqvAmount.description: The premium equivalent amount for the insurance plan for a specific tier.

Rate.description: The rate at which the employer contributes for the insurance for each employee.

RateBasisAmount.description: The basis amount that's used to calculate the insurance rate or fee value.

RateQualifierAmount.description: A per unit amount that's used to calculate premiums for benefit volume or covered payroll based plans.

Tier.description: Specifies the employee tier that's used to determine the plan rate.
